mapper.select: SELECT * FROM EMBLEM_RATE ORDER BY JOB_DETAIL_SEQ, CAST(RATE AS DECIMAL(4,2)) DESC
SELECT * FROM EMBLEM_RATE GROUP BY EMBLEM_NAME

SELECT R.EMBLEM_RATE_SEQ , R.EMBLEM_NAME , R.JOB_DETAIL_SEQ , R.RATE , R.EMBLEM_COLOR , IFNULL(P.PRICE, '0') PRICE FROM EMBLEM_RATE R LEFT JOIN EMBLEM_PRICE P ON R.EMBLEM_NAME = P.EMBLEM_NAME ORDER BY R.JOB_DETAIL_SEQ, R.EMBLEM_COLOR, CAST(R.RATE AS DECIMAL(4,2)) DESC
